text: Sarah Jane Brown (n√©e Macaulay; born 31 October 1963), usually known as Sarah Brown, is a British campaigner for global health and education, founder and president of the children's charity Theirworld. She was a founding partner of Hobsbawm Macaulay Communications. She is married to Gordon Brown, who was Chancellor of the Exchequer from 1997 to 2007 and Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 2007 to 2010. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:English businesspeople Category:People from Buckinghamshire Category:Spouses of prime ministers of the United Kingdom Category:Alumni of the University of Bristol
title: Sarah Jane Brown
